name: Bilal Iqbal
bio: Hello! I'm Bilal Iqbal, a Software Engineer based in Dublin, Ireland, with over five years of professional experience in backend and infrastructure development.
My expertise primarily lies in using Java, Python, and Go to design and develop scalable microservices, implement CI/CD automation, and build cloud-native solutions.
When I'm not immersed in software engineering, I enjoy projects, sports (especially cricket!), videography, travel, and volunteering.

timeline.title: Career Break & Upskilling
items: Took a career break to travel and reflect on long-term direction.
Upskilled through online courses in Cloud Computing and AI.
Launched an e-commerce business and developed a missing persons GPS tool.

timeline.title: Software Engineer @ Ericsson, Athlone
items: Led CI/CD improvements using Kubernetes and Docker.
Improved observability and mentored junior engineers.

timeline.title: MSc in Applied Software Technology @ TUS, Athlone
BEng in Computer Engineering @ TUD, Dublin
